client.apis.v1.tests.test_list_company_type 源代码

# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-
"""
@Summary : 测试获取公司类型列表
@Author  : Rey
@Time    : 2022-03-23 20:27:59
@Run     : python manage.py test client.apis.v1.tests.test_list_company_type  -v=3 --keepdb
"""
from rest_framework import status
from rest_framework.test import APITestCase

from client.apis.v1.tests.base import create_user, action_cache
from utils.jwt_util import user_info_2_token



[文档]class TestListCompanyType(APITestCase):
    """测试CompanyTypeListAPIView.list"""
    databases = {'default', 'credible_data'}
    fixtures = ('const_company.json',)


[文档]    @action_cache
    def client_request(self, uid: int):
        """封装请求

        :param int uid: 用户id
        """
        create_user(user_id=uid)
        path = '/api/v1/scf/client/company_type/'
        token = user_info_2_token({'user_id': uid})
        self.client.credentials(HTTP_AUTHORIZATION=f'Bear {bytes.decode(token)}')
        return self.client.get(path=path)



[文档]    def test_success(self):
        """测试成功"""
        resp = self.client_request(uid=1)
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)

        self.assertEqual(len(resp_json['data']), 3)
